title: Address details
h1: What is your contact or home address?
hint: We'll send any correspondence to this address.
enterAddressManually: I want to enter the address manually.

address1.required: You have not entered your building and street address. Enter a building and street for your contact or home address.

addressCounty.required: You have not entered your county. Enter a county for your contact or home address.

addressTown.required: You have not entered your town or city. Enter a town or city before continuing.

addressPostcode.required: You have not entered your postcode. Enter a postcode for your contact or home address.
addressPostcode.invalid: You have not entered a valid UK postcode. Enter a valid UK postcode before continuing.
